page.title: 01Introduction To Our Area.
page.content: Our area is near the southern coast of Cornwall. The villages around us are called Trewoon, Lanjeth and High Street. Our School is on the outskirts of the town called St. Austell. It is mainly surrounded by countryside. This area is only a few miles away from the sea and many local people enjoy going to the beach for recreation. The area around us is very rural and contains many farms in and around the villages. There are many country lanes and footpaths to explore which gives many people the opportunity to enjoy the countryside. Many local people are employed in the huge China Clay Industry which surrounds this area. Quite a few people are involved with tourism because this area is quite popular with holidaymakers. Most of the farms are quite small because the land is quite undulating. (Mike Yates)
